hints.content: Let's try each strategy one at a time to see if they work.

Add $2+9$ then add $2$ then add $3$.

> $\begin{align}\\
\greenD{29}+\purpleC{23}=&=\greenD{20}+\greenD{9}+\purpleC{20}+\purpleC3\\
&\ne \,\,\,\redD{2}+\greenD{9}+\,\,\,\redD{2}+\purpleC{3}\\
\end{align}$

>No, this strategy does **not** work.

**The following strategy can be used to add $29+23$.**

- Add $30+22$.

question.content:
